biotools.summary: Tool that combines different protein signature recognition methods into one resource. It is a reimplementation of the traditional InterProScan 4.x series and adds features such as pathway annotations and signal peptide and transmembrane prediction using Phobius.

bioschemas.name: InterProScan WS (EBI)
bioschemas.summary: Tool that combines different protein signature recognition methods into one resource. It is a reimplementation of the traditional InterProScan 4.x series and adds features such as pathway annotations and signal peptide and transmembrane prediction using Phobius.
